ygData.subject: Another use for Bone Chips...
ygData.msgSnippet: Welll.. I made level 15 a day or two ago, and got our rank 2 spells. Fine and dandy. I had checked my inventory and I had about 13 bone chips. So I did our
ygData.messageBody:
Welll.. I made level 15 a day or two ago, and got our rank 2 spells. Fine
and dandy. I had checked my inventory and I had about 13 bone chips. So I
did our next pet, Bone Walk, and went down to 11, as I expected. Though..
what I didn't know, until now... was when you cast the spell:

Numb the Dead

it eats up another bone chip per casting. So.. just thought I'd share with
everyone. Now I know why it seemd like I went from 11 bone chips to 0 when I
hadn't been casting my pet spell at all <grin>
